I am working on a CFD code for reacting flows and would like to use
Cantera=
 to compute the reaction source terms.  Since our code is
written in c++, I=
 am only interested in Cantera's static libraries. 
Our code is run in linu=
x on different architectures and is always
being recompiled.   I would like=
 to copy the Cantera/src and ext/
folders (as far as I can tell they are th=
e only ones I need) into our
code's directory tree and compile them with ou=
r code.  Is this
possible?  How would I alter the Cantera makefiles?
